channel.title: Projects on Portfolio website for Beatriz
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Portfolio website for Beatriz

item.title: Tourism
item.description: Load the data Tourism_data <- read_excel('C:\\Users\\beatr\\OneDrive\\Ambiente de Trabalho\\tourism.xls') glimpse(Tourism_data) ## Rows: 84 ## Columns: 4 ## $ Location <chr> "Portugal", "Portugal", "Portugal", "Portugal",... ## $ Year <chr> "2019", "2019", "2019", "2019", "2019", "2019",... ## $ `Accomodation type` <chr> "Total", "Hospitality establishments", "Youth h... ## $ `Overnight stays` <dbl> 77822655, 68194189, 472975, 6941638, 249078, 19... Tourism_data_new <- Tourism_data %>% rename("Accomodation_type" = `Accomodation type`, "Overnight_stays" = `Overnight stays`, "Accomodation_type" = `Accomodation type`) %>% transform.

item.title: Wine
item.description: Load the data Wine_data <- read_excel('C:\\Users\\beatr\\OneDrive\\Ambiente de Trabalho\\Wine.xls') glimpse(Wine_data) ## Rows: 33 ## Columns: 3 ## $ Localization <chr> "Portuguese Mainland", "Portuguese M... ## $ Year <chr> "2019", "2018", "2017", "2016", "201... ## $ `Wine production (hectolitre)` <dbl> 6474757, 6013078, 6688965, 5982274, ... Wine_data_new <- Wine_data %>% rename("Wine_production_hl" = `Wine production (hectolitre)`) %>% transform.data.frame(`Year` = as.numeric(as.character(`Year`)), `Wine_production_hl`= as.numeric(as.character(`Wine_production_hl`))) Wine_data_new ## Localization Year Wine_production_hl ## 1 Portuguese Mainland 2019 6474757 ## 2 Portuguese Mainland 2018 6013078 ## 3 Portuguese Mainland 2017 6688965 ## 4 Portuguese Mainland 2016 5982274 ## 5 Portuguese Mainland 2015 6991655 ## 6 Portuguese Mainland 2014 6152005 ## 7 Portuguese Mainland 2013 6181615 ## 8 Portuguese Mainland 2012 6272479 ## 9 Portuguese Mainland 2011 5572402 ## 10 Portuguese Mainland 2010 7106363 ## 11 Portuguese Mainland 2009 5834310 ## 12 Azores 2019 13246 ## 13 Azores 2018 13285 ## 14 Azores 2017 5034 ## 15 Azores 2016 5845 ## 16 Azores 2015 10404 ## 17 Azores 2014 12926 ## 18 Azores 2013 6595 ## 19 Azores 2012 4991 ## 20 Azores 2011 11370 ## 21 Azores 2010 4783 ## 22 Azores 2009 13754 ## 23 Madeira 2019 38559 ## 24 Madeira 2018 34880 ## 25 Madeira 2017 42773 ## 26 Madeira 2016 33849 ## 27 Madeira 2015 45747 ## 28 Madeira 2014 40825 ## 29 Madeira 2013 43136 ## 30 Madeira 2012 49637 ## 31 Madeira 2011 38591 ## 32 Madeira 2010 36781 ## 33 Madeira 2009 45448 plot1w <- Wine_data_new %>% ggplot(mapping = aes(x = `Year`, y = `Wine_production_hl`)) + geom_point() + facet_wrap(~ Localization, scales = "free_y") + theme_bw() plot1w

About Portugal… Portugal is one of Europe’s oldest extant nations, an ancient kingdom defended by hilltop castles and dramatic walled towns. When you travel to Portugal for the first time you will most likely be struck by the friendliness of the people, affordable food and wine, and the diversity of a country that is relatively easy to travel around in just a few days. It is a landscape of beaches and high mountains, but also of deep, verdant valleys and rolling hills dotted with stone-built villages.
